showScoreExcerpt:
I’ve seen numerous "Macbeth"s across the years, but that didn’t prevent me from having trouble deciphering certain moments in this staging. I can’t imagine what someone who’s never seen or read the play could possibly get here, except an excuse to catch up on their sleep. Shakespearean storytelling not being Mr. Gold’s best suit, it’s hard to figure out precisely what he hoped to illuminate about Macbeth with his precious tinkering.
